product_name: Charlotte TilburyAirbrush Flawless Finish Setting Powder
summary: SummaryCharlotte Tilbury's Airbrush Flawless Finish Setting Powder is an ultra-fine setting powder that blurs imperfections and visibly reduces shine.
details: DetailsBenefitsThis micro-fine powder gives you an immaculate complexion and doesn't cake or sit in fine lines.Rose Wax and Almond Oil hydrate and smooth skin.Ideal for long-lasting complexion or a perfecting finishing touch. And you can now stay flawless because Airbrush Flawless Finish is refillable!Medium Coverage.Best for Oily, Combo, Normal Skin.Key IngredientsRose Wax and Almond Oil: Help to nourish, soften, and moisturize the skin.Light-reflecting Pearls: Pearlescent pigments diffuse light as it hits your face to luminate the complexion.Item 2619306How To UseUsing the Powder & Sculpt Brush (sold separately), apply Airbrush Flawless Finish around the nose, T-zone, and any other oily areas that need to be mattified.It can be used on its own, or on top of foundation and concealer to set them in place.For oily skin types looking for a truly flawless finish, apply Airbrush Flawless Finish all over the face for more coverage, starting from the T-zone and working outwards and upwards.IngredientsTalc, Mica, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Dimethicone, Silica, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Zinc Stearate, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Chlorphenesin, Potassium Sorbate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pei-10, Propylene Glycol, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Rosa Multiflora Flower Wax, Tetrasodium EDTA, Aqua/Water/Eau, Dimethiconol, Tilia Cordata Flower Extract, Methylparaben, Ethylparaben, Propylparaben, Butylparaben. May Contain: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Using the Powder & Sculpt Brush (sold separately), apply Airbrush Flawless Finish around the nose, T-zone, and any other oily areas that need to be mattified.It can be used on its own, or on top of foundation and concealer to set them in place.For oily skin types looking for a truly flawless finish, apply Airbrush Flawless Finish all over the face for more coverage, starting from the T-zone and working outwards and upwards.

reviews.headline: It's near perfect
reviews.comments: As perfect as a power foundation can get

reviews.headline: Yes love the products got many compliments
reviews.comments: This looks amazing

reviews.headline: Yes love her prouducts
reviews.comments: Her products look amazing I feel very pretty and people tell me that as well.

reviews.headline: Awful
reviews.comments: Absolutely awful. I used this product and it oxidized by a ton and my skin got oily very quick.

reviews.headline: Worth the money!
reviews.comments: I definitely find myself having to use less powder when I use this product!

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this setting powder it truly makes my makeup look flawless and have no creases at all , lasts all day but on hotter days when im outside i do have to reapply once but other than that its a 10/10 for me

reviews.headline: I would highly recommend
reviews.comments: This goes on so smooth

reviews.headline: i did not like it
reviews.comments: its deff not for everyone, it was too drying to my skin and when i would try to get product the powder would move and i couldnt get any product. for how expensive it is i would expect better quality and packaging.

reviews.headline: Love this powder!
reviews.comments: Does not cake and covers well.   Blends perfectly and not an overwhelming amount of colors to choose from.

reviews.headline: Not a lot of shades
reviews.comments: I love this powder and i can go all day without having to touch up my makeup much. Butâ€¦. It only has 4 shades and even the lightest shade "fair" is too dark for me. Ive used blue concealer to try and help but i really think the only issue with this powder is the shade range. Wouldnt buy again only for that reason .

reviews.headline: Broke
reviews.comments: I bought this one time and within that month I dropped it once from a low position and it completely shattered the powder. I wouldn't mind paying this much for a product that works as well as it does, but it does need better packaging because that is a lot of money to just go to waste.

reviews.headline: This is a must have for staying matte all day  in the t zone
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this powder! Although it's really pricey in my opinion, is sets your make up and keeps your t zone matte all day.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: I actually got a sample of this from another store and fell in love. Ordered the full size and love it. It definitely finishes my look really well over a tinted moisturizer. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.headline: Not full coverage
reviews.comments: This to me is not full coverage. I use it more as just taking off the shine of my skin to matte my foundation down a bit. Doesn't seem to cover as well as I would like. It does feel nice and smooth on my skin.

reviews.headline: Love this for my dry skin
reviews.comments: This works really well for dry skin. My under eyes get really dry with most powders but this leaves a nice blurred glow

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: Love how it leave my skin looking so natural and s.ooth all day

reviews.headline: Dropped Once
reviews.comments: I dropped it once, and the entire thing shattered and fell out. Too expensive to replace.

reviews.headline: always go back to this powder
reviews.comments: I try so many powders but always run back to this one. it does it all for me, sets undereyes and touch up friendly. I only use concealer and this powder and it looks so creamy and nice on the skin without being heavy. I love that u can get the refills now too.

reviews.headline: Light Powder
reviews.comments: I've carried the small compact in my purse for a couple of years. I purchased the full size using my Ulta Beauty Points and Sale price.

reviews.headline: i would not buy it again
reviews.comments: It's too cakey every time i put it on my makeup looks bad I wanted to like this products but nah

media.headline: Amazing Compact of Coverage
media.caption: Its Summer Time and I'm Feeling Fine

faceoff_positive.comments: I'm in my mid-30s and have been a long-time user of Laura Mercier loose powder. I completely ran out of powder recently and my local Ulta didn't have the Laura Mercier powder in stock in my shade. An employee recommended this Charlotte Tilbury pressed powder, said it was very blurring and didn't settle into fine wrinkles. I matched my shade, came home. I wore it for two days, and I kept catching glimpses of myself in the mirror at work, noticing exaggerated fine lines under my eyes and a cake-y texture. Did not care for that. The third time I wore it was the day I was planning to return it. I applied it a lot less heavy under my eyes that day, and while clothes shopping with my daughter kept noticing how smooth my complexion and pores looked in the dressing room mirror. I decided to keep using it a little longer, and realized that initially I was applying it heavy under my eyes like I did with the Laura Mercier powder. Once I backed off a little, everything balanced out. A dab will definitely do with this product. I'm still acclimating, but I think I really like it!
faceoff_positive.headline: Almost returned, but so glad I didn't!

faceoff_negative.comments: For the price of this powder i was a little disappointed. It makes my fine lines and dry spots appear more visible after long hours of makeup. I do have severely dry and matchy skin so prehaps that is why this product does that. Honestly the packaging iteself is more enticing then the actual product inside. There are better quality and cheaper options such as the too faced press powder (which has super cute packaging as well). The best aspect about this press powder is that it definitely helps blurr my conclear creases throughout the day.
faceoff_negative.headline: It's good but not great (there's better out there)
